# Descripción de ficheros

Nombre             | Descripción
-------------------|------------------------------------------------------------
glm_bin_01.csv       |   Table shows numbers of beetles dead after five hours exposure to gaseous carbon disulphide at various concentrations (Table 7.2 Dobson).
glm_bin_02.csv       |   Numbers of embryogenic anthers ofthe plant species Datura innoxia Mill. obtained when numbers njk ofan thers were prepared under several different conditions. There is one qualitative factor with two levels, a treatment consisting ofstorage at 3◦C for 48 hours or a control storage condition, and one continuous explanatory variable represented by three values of centrifuging force (Table 7.5 Dobson).

# Ejecución para la lectura de cada fichero

```{r glm_poisson, eval=FALSE}
### Para cargar los datos
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
##### Lectura de cada ejemplo
# glm_bin_01
glm_bin_01=read_csv("https://goo.gl/E2MlSZ", col_types = "dii")
str(glm_bin_01)
# glm_bin_02
glm_bin_02=read_csv("https://goo.gl/6P3zRr", col_types = "ddcd")
str(glm_bin_02)
# Recodificación del factor
glm_bin_02 %>% mutate(storage=fct_recode(storage,"Control" = "1","treatment" = "2"))
```
